No, seriously, just kidding. Great upload, mate!
-108- Nice! Nice! Nice! hard to find these is right. Did 'ya get THEIR Chicago VFR I upped a few months ago?

Thank you.
For anyone that has Simflyer KLAS Mcaren they may want to move it above this scenery in the Library.

blankbox: yeah, I did - thanks 4 that one!

I just woke up and realized that I tolly fukt up on the KHND AFCAD I put in here though. It was late and I was steadilly sucumbing to a Xanax - lol - so I forgot to turn on the lights & Navaids and theck them. DOH!
That means the only things aligned properly are the runways, all taxiways, parking and tarmac areas. I gotta fix that ASAP. Shiza - no starting positions either! damn. Oh well...
Stay tuned for a flatten fix for KHND - looks like I blew that too. lol

The update is done! But you'll have to visit the Las Vegas Photoreal thread at wickedfriends.org for the DL link cuz I don't wanna upload a bunch of freeware here at TPB.

Enjoy!
108
...btw, you'll want to completely discard the above afcad fix if you've installed it, cuz this replaces it.
